abstracts.cdata!:
This Aide Memoire on the Project
            Development of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises for
            Nicaragua reports that the World Bank sent a mission to
            Nicaragua during the week of April 7th 2014. The purpose of
            the visit was: 1) to supervise the execution of the
            activities of the business climate and shared funds; 2) to
            revise the impacts already realized; 3) to discuss the
            closing of the project and the sustainability of the
            impacts. The state of implementation of the project was
            considered satisfactory.
